title: Can you tell me words that have silent 'b' in English language? - Quora

response.answer_text: Doubt Debt Are the two words that came instantaneously but there are a few other which I don't believe are correct such as Comb, bomb, dumb, lamb, limb, climb or anything that has “MB" I said I object these since you pronounce them including b atleast in Indian accent But in British accent (suggested) has all these words with “b” silent Debt and doubt are two words which you can confidently tell
